name: Mesmerizing Uttarakhand
summary: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites
description: Auli implies an amazing spot that lets you grasp the finest slants and tilts of the Himalayan range. Embark on this thrilling experience starting from the beautiful road journey from Haridwar to Joshimath while passing the holy places like Devprayag, Rudraprayag and Karnaprayag. Experience nature coming alive in full glory in a small yet picture-perfect town of Auli and stir the adventurer in you for some adrenaline-pumping activities in Rishikesh by the banks of the holy Ganga.

name: Fall in Love with Rajasthan
summary: Visit City Palace, One of the highest and largest palaces in India, built on 598-meter high plateau that has even hosted James bond movie
description: The land of vibrant colors, rich heritage, scenic locations, majestic lakes, beautiful palaces, golden sands and everything else in between, Rajasthan with its royal essence welcomes you with all its heart. With this tour package experience the transition from rich greenery and serene lakes in Jaipur & Udaipur to the dry deserts in Jodhpur and Jaisalmer

name: Romantic Andaman
summary: Admire the grace of tropical islands in Andaman with this specially curated package ideal for Couples and Honeymooners
description: Andaman is ideal for a romantic getaway among stunning beaches and towering mangroves. A place embellished with shimmering white sand, turquoise water, and breathtaking corals is a feast for the eyes. Walk hand in hand with your loved ones to explore the marine gems and witness the most astounding sunsets and sunrises that will soothe your inner being. Embark on this incredible 7-day tour to experience a perfect romantic getaway.

name: God's own country Kerala
summary: Relax on the houseboat in Alleppy and float around tranquil backwaters while listening the sound of water ripples and whisper of the wind
description: Kerala, a jewel of a tourist destination in the southern part of the country, is known for its alluring charm and beauty. Embraced by the Malabar Coast, jotted by lush coconut groves, and fringed by a network of canals, holidays in Kerala or Godâ€™s Own Country are all about the pristine and untouched beauty of Mother Nature.

name: Golden Triangle Tour
summary: Capture the beauty of the universally admired masterpiece - Taj Mahal, and realize why it is one of the 7 Wonders of the World
description: A fun-filled family trip of absolute amazement and discovery through the iconic and ancient cities of India - Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur, popularly known as the Golden Triangle. The golden triangle tour is a quintessential introduction to the rich culture, tradition and history of India, especially for the first time travelers. These 3 cities are bestowed with a beautiful amalgamation of Mughal, Persian, and Hindu Architectural buildings that reflect the rich history, glory, and grandeur

name: The Sports Lover
summary: Surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing and more, all in one tour
